name: Code 9
description: In this Kakuro-inspired puzzler, you're on a number budget. Try your hand at mastering these simple digits in this colorful, upbeat puzzler. Your goal is simple: combine numbers in their respective rows or columns until all the conditions are met. Will you be able to handle all the tricks waiting in store?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.0 Ghz Processor or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 50 MB available space
